data:item.name: MCXW71 Accel and Light BLE
data:item.display_title: MCXW71 Accelerometer and light sensor over Wireless UART
data:item.overview: This demo serves as guide on enabling FXLS897xxx accelerometer over I2C and light sensor over ADC readings. The ADC conversions are trigger by a hardware timer trigger. The I2C transfers make use of CMSIS-Drives. Interact application through the IoT Toolbox using a Smartphone.
